mapper.insert: INSERT INTO list (board_id, title, order_index, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{title}, #{orderIndex}, NOW(), NOW(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT id, board_id, title, order_index AS orderIndex FROM list WHERE id = #{listId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT id, board_id, title, order_index AS orderIndex, is_archived AS isArchived FROM list WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY order_index ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE list SET title = #{title}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE list SET is_archived = #{isArchived}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{listId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE list SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{listId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE list SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE list l JOIN board b ON l.board_id = b.id SET l.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE b.team_id = #{teamId} AND l.deleted_at IS NULL
